Interface GameFacadeObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameBoardFacadeView
public interface GameFacadeObserver

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    UpdateCurrentPlayerChanged(Player currentPlayer)
    Notifies that the current player has changed in the game.
    void
    UpdatePlayerObjectiveChanged(int objective)
    Notifies observers that the player's current objective has changed.
    void
    UpdatePlayerPositionChanged(Position newPosition)
    Notifies observers that the player's position has changed.
    void
    UpdatePlayerPositionChanged(Position[] positions)
    Notifies observers that the positions of one or more players have changed.

  • Method Details

    • UpdateCurrentPlayerChanged

      void UpdateCurrentPlayerChanged(Player currentPlayer)
      Notifies that the current player has changed in the game.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - : Player object representing the new current player

    • UpdatePlayerPositionChanged

      void UpdatePlayerPositionChanged(Position newPosition)
      Notifies observers that the player's position has changed. This method is a callback that should be implemented by observers to respond to updates in player positioning within the game.
      Parameters:
      newPosition - : new Position object representing the updated coordinates of the player on the game board

    • UpdatePlayerPositionChanged

      void UpdatePlayerPositionChanged(Position[] positions)
      Notifies observers that the positions of one or more players have changed. This method serves as a callback to update observers with an array of updated player positions on the game board.
      Parameters:
      positions - an array of Position objects representing the updated coordinates of one or more players on the game board

    • UpdatePlayerObjectiveChanged

      void UpdatePlayerObjectiveChanged(int objective)
      Notifies observers that the player's current objective has changed. This method is intended for implementation by observers to update their state or view according to the player's progress in their objectives.
      Parameters:
      objective - : new objective index for the player, indicating the updated state or advancement in the player's objectives within the game
